about_the_game:
This is a very basic demo of CVR. It has most of the tools needed to build a basic city. Sounds have been removed since they are not done and there are many bugs and unfished features.

This demo includes:
- many buildings
- many tools
- weather system
- day/night
- pollution
- people in the city
- basic world gen

Please report any issues to the community page or the server!
